Articles.Content:
Hi,

I recently downloaded the Kerrari GTO from CardBoardBoxProcessor, and I can\'t manage to land it withouth killing my kerbals... Did anyone made it safely ?

i managed to set up mechjeb to land it like a plane and it worked!

well except the fact that the engine ran out of fuel and could not take back off from the skidding and fell in the water, hopefully jeb took his swimming trunks 8)
